entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening except gusting to 60 near Haro Strait late this evening and overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 early in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
